title: Custom Metamask
description: I implemented a remote kind of account on the metamask wallet, which means all the private keys are saved on the server and all the transactions and messages are being signed on the backend. So to do this, I had to build a customized keyring script and add it to the Keyring Controller. To elaborate further, I have an approve/decline feature on the backend and it gives the benefit to manage all the accounts on the server.

title: Rarible - aggregated NFT marketplace with rewards
description: Online marketplace offers a platform for users to securely buy, sell, and discover digital assets. It features a wide range of collections, including art, fashion, science, and gaming. At first, I developed the individual Color mesium NFT marketplace. After then I created The color NFT collection in Rarible.

title: Hex Toys - NFT marketplace
description: HEX TOYS is the ultimate NFT marketplace on PulseChain, offering generous rewards. Buy, sell, and trade unique digital collectibles.

title: Arrest Warrant Bot
description: A wanted poster generate telegram bot for $wanted meme coin and its community

title: Target Brand
description: Target.com is the online presence of Target Corporation, built with Next.JS, a major American retailer known for offering a wide range of products, including clothing, electronics, toys, groceries, and home goods. The website provides a convenient shopping experience with features like online deals, Target Circle offers, and RedCard discounts. It's designed to cater to various shopping needs, from everyday essentials to seasonal items, and allows customers to shop both online and in-store. Additionally, Target Corporation's website includes information about their mission, values, history, and corporate responsibility initiatives.

title: OUTFITTERY
description: OutFittery offers a unique styling service for men, built with Next.JS, providing personalized outfits selected by professional stylists. Customers receive a curated box of clothes to try at home, paying only for what they keep. This service combines convenience with tailored fashion advice, revolutionizing the shopping experience.

title: UHR INSTINKT
description: Uhrinstinkt is an online retailer specializing in luxury watches built with Nuxt.JS. They offer a wide range of exclusive watch brands and boast a large inventory with over 1,500 models in stock. Customers have the benefit of a 21-day return policy and the convenience of free shipping. The website emphasizes low prices and provides free consultation to assist buyers in selecting the perfect timepiece. Whether you're looking to buy, sell, or find a specific watch, Uhrinstinkt aims to cater to various needs related to luxury watches.nt colors and intricate designs for you wardrobe.

title: Lunachow
description: LunaChow is the world’s first crypto protocol leveraging the power of community to build a better token that maximizes fairness and profits. LunaChow is an ERC-20 token built on the Ethereum network, the world’s largest decentralized smart contract ecosystem.

description: RND match figma design

title: The Dog House
description: In this game development, I participated in the front-end development of the game using godot.Due to my high responsibility and neatness, this game has received a high reputation from users.

title: Love Tap
description: A Telegram mini-app where 32 virtual women are in a bracket-style competition to win a date with the Bachelor. Each week there are match-ups, and users get to vote on which women advance to the next round. At the end, whoever wins the bracket gets the Bachelor.

title: Wild Depth Slot Game
description: In this game development, I participated in the front-end development of the game using godot. And also developed Back-End using ASP.NET. Due to my high responsibility and neatness, this game has received a high reputation from users.

title: WildWarZ - Crypto Game
description: WildWarZ is a play to earn NFT game based on Polygon Blockchain. Play with companion, earn $WIND, stake $WILD, trade NFTs & govern DAO.

title: LEARN PAC
description: LearnPac Systems is a prominent UK provider of accredited online training courses, e-learning programmes, and internationally recognized qualifications, built with Go Language for backend and React for the frontend. They offer over 500 online training programmes across various sectors, accessible through their interactive online learning portal. With over a decade of experience in the e-learning industry, LearnPac Systems provides a free blended learning environment that can be customized to individual organizations, regardless of size or sector.

title: BONOKEY
description: Bonokey.com emerges as a pioneering digital platform dedicated to demystifying the banking landscape of Saudi Arabia for its users. With a commitment to providing comprehensive, up-to-date information on various banks across the kingdom, Bonokey.com stands as a critical resource for anyone looking to navigate the complexities of banking services. This platform is meticulously crafted using cutting-edge technologies such as Next.js , PostgreSQL, and ChatGPT-4, supplemented by advanced SEO strategies and the Prisma ORM, to ensure a seamless, informative, and interactive user experience.

title: racing-empire
description: This is a Telegram bot that tracks the transactions of added Ethereum (ETH) and Binance Coin (BNB) wallets and sends notifications whenever a new transaction occurs. The bot uses the Etherscan and BSCscan APIs to gather information about transactions, and CoinGecko to fetch the current prices of ETH and BNB.

title: The Diamond Hands - NFT
description: The Diamond Hands is a collection of 11111 programmatically, randomly generated NFTs on the Ethereum blockchain.

title: SUNY
description: The State University of New York (SUNY) is the largest comprehensive university system in the United States, built with Python. It encompasses 64 institutions, including research universities, academic medical centers, liberal arts colleges, community colleges, colleges of technology, and an online learning network. SUNY offers a wide range of programs and degrees, and it has a significant impact on education, research, and the economy in New York.

title: DX Compliance Solution
description: DX Compliance Solutions is a company that specializes in regulatory compliance and risk management solutions, particularly in the field of Anti-Money Laundering (AML), built with Java as backend and Vue.js as frontend. They offer innovative software designed to help banks and FinTech companies comply with AML regulations and fight against organized crime. Their services include transaction monitoring, machine learning for real-time data analysis, and tools for reporting suspicious activities.

title: fayre.com - Part NFT Marketplace,  Part Fan Activation Hub
description: The Diamond Hands is a collection of 11111 programmatically, randomly generated NFTs on the Ethereum blockchain.

title: EggSwap - Solana Bitcoin Bridge
description: We have created a blockchain bridge allowing the transfer of BRC20 tokens between the Bitcoin (BTC) blockchain and the Solana blockchain like Sobit bridge. It includes a BTC wallet for token lock/release, a Solana smart contract for minting/burning tokens, and a Node.js Application For Cross-chain communication. We integrated Unisat wallet and Phantom wallet. We made a solana token smart contract as we need to perform token minting and burning corresponding to BTC transactions.

title: Wigwam
description: Wigwam is a Web3 wallet that is secure, simple, and superior. It is designed to be a feature-rich crypto wallet for the decentralized world. Overall, Wigwam is a robust and feature-rich Web3 wallet focused on providing a secure, simple, and superior user experience across multiple blockchain networks.

title: ETHAN HATHAWAY

They cover a broad range of topics, including asset management, corporate finance, risk management, leadership, and much more. Their courses are designed by industry experts and aim to be practical, applicable, and valuable for career growth.

title: Flappybee
description: In this project, i built both frontend & backend, smart contract based on eth. Used MERN stack to store all scores into database and implement reward system using auto withdraw function from backend & smart contract side. Also, built p2e game as flappy and then add some logic to make it fun depending on BEE NFT.

title: WARDEN 3.0 (Still Working)
description: WardenSwap is a decentralized exchange that allows users to swap cryptocurrencies without the need for a centralized intermediary.The platform use built-in machine learning algorithms to provide users with the 'Best Price' for their trades. WardenSwap is using advanced pricing models and analytics to optimize trade execution.

title: Wanaka Farm
description: Wanaka Farm is a blockchain-based virtual farming and marketplace platform.I developed this platfrom utilizes blockchain technology, with contract addresses provided for the WANA, WAI, and LAND tokens.

title: Ton Jump Game
description: While working on this project, I responsible for the in-game sprite store with coin purchase and block purchase system. to briefly introduce this function, all existing and future players will be credited with 2000 coins, of which 500 coins can be spent on building a game level and 1500 coins on purchasing sprites in the store. if a player needs more coins for building a large level, they can purchase coins with TON and spend them on buying various blocks

title: New Build Homes
description: Browse our listings to find new build homes for sale. Updated frequently with new properties from across the country

title: Century Communities
description: Century Communities is a prominent homebuilder in the United States, known for offering a wide range of housing options, including single-family homes, townhomes, condos, and paired homes, built with Python Django. They operate in 18 states and over 45 markets, providing a variety of floor plans and quick move-in homes. With a focus on quality and customer satisfaction, they offer a hands-on homebuying process tailored to the needs and lifestyle of their clients. Additionally, they provide in-house services like home loans, title insurance, and home insurance to simplify the homebuying experience.
